NTSB rarely releases much info in their first-day briefing, especially when it's done before they even get on site. It's mostly an introduction to media who may not be familiar with how they operate. Expect a lot of this. They don't speculate or answer q's until they're sure. https://t.co/Zml9aUV8yD
